document.full_text: intel corp would consider making chips for rivals, but any proposal to use its advanced manufacturing technology to make processors based on a competing architecture would trigger an "in-depth discussion."
document.title: intel might make chips based on non-intel cores
lines_and_colors: intel corp would consider making chips for rivals, but any proposal to use its advanced manufacturing technology to make processors based on a competing architecture would trigger an "in-depth discussion."
